item.title: Data from Organic matter and nutrient inputs from large wildlife influence ecosystem function in the Mara River, Africa
item.description: Sources Summary Set up Import Reproducibility Nutrient dissolution rates Statistical methods ANOVA results Posthoc pairwise comparisons Decomposition rates Statistical methods ANOVA results Nutrient limitation Statistical method Respiration Results Chlorophyll a results Ecosystem Function Statistical Methods Results Statistical red-flags Sources Summary Set up library(broom) library(ggplot2) library(ggpubr) library(data.table) library(readxl) library(nlme) library(emmeans) data_folder <- "../data" folder <- "Data from Organic matter and nutrient inputs from large wildlife influence ecosystem function in the Mara River, Africa" # images need to be moved to /static/images/data from.
